trans-unit.source: Customizes SOAP generation and processing for target types.
trans-unit.target: 自訂 SOAP 產生和處理對於目標類型。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The SoapTypeAttribute attribute is a custom attribute that can be applied to objects, value types, and interface objects.
trans-unit.target: SoapTypeAttribute 屬性是可以套用至物件、 實值類型和介面物件的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to specify information on an object type that controls how SOAP will generate the SOAP XML wire format.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來指定控制如何 SOAP 會產生 SOAP XML 電傳格式的物件類型的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapOption"></xref> configuration value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapOption"></xref>組態值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapOption> value indicates the SOAP configuration options that will be used with a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapOption>值表示將使用的 SOAP 組態選項<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapOption>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SoapOptions enumeration has no effect on serialization of objects with the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SoapOptions 列舉型別的序列化具有<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>的物件不會影響

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapOption"></xref> configuration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapOption"> </xref>組態值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the target of the current attribute will be serialized as an XML attribute instead of an XML field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出目前屬性的目標是否會序列化為 XML 屬性而不是 XML 欄位。

trans-unit.source: The UseAttribute property cannot be set on the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Soaptypeattribute 中屬性無法設定上<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The current implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的實作一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the current property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定目前的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML element name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The XML element name.
trans-unit.target: XML 項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML field order for the target object type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標物件類型的 XML 欄位順序。

trans-unit.source: The XML field order for the target object type.
trans-unit.target: 之目標物件類型的 XML 欄位順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace that is used during serialization of the target object type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標物件型別的序列化期間使用的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace that is used during serialization of the target object type.
trans-unit.target: 目標物件型別的序列化期間使用之 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML type name for the target object type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標物件類型的 XML 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The XML type name for the target object type.
trans-unit.target: 目標物件型別的 XML 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML type namespace for the current object type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的物件類型的 XML 型別命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The XML type namespace for the current object type.
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件類型的 XML 型別命名空間。
